Post:
"Feeling down and hopeless again...I just want to escape into my own world and forget about everything. Maybe I'll treat myself to some 'me' time tonight 😏"

This post displays a global attributional style because it takes a single event (feeling down and hopeless) and extends it to the individual's whole life, implying that they are destined to fail or be unsuccessful in everything they do. It also emphasizes the importance of affiliation by suggesting that the individual turn to self-pleasure or sexual activity as a coping mechanism for their depression, which falls under the category of intimate relationships and sense of belongingness.
Transferred_Post:
"I'm feeling overwhelmed and hopeless again...I just want to take a break from everything and indulge in some self-care tonight 😏"

Explanation:

In this transferred post, we have transformed the global attributional style into a specific attributional style. Instead of generalizing the cause of feeling down and hopeless to the individual's whole life, we have made it more specific by focusing on the impact of a single event (feeling overwhelmed) on their personal and emotional life. We have also changed the coping mechanism from treating themselves to some 'me' time tonight 😏" to indulging in some self-care tonight 😏", which now falls under the category of personal care and relaxation, rather than intimate relationships and sense of belongingness.
